text: Hollerado is a Canadian indie rock band from Manotick, Ontario. Hollerado has four members in the band; the current band members are Dean Baxter, Jake Boyd, Nixon Boyd and Menno Versteeg. Their name is a parody of the United States state, Colorado. == Band members == ;Current *Dean Baxter - bass guitar & vocals *Jake Boyd - drums & vocals *Nixon Boyd - guitar & vocals *Menno Versteeg - guitar & lead vocals == Discography == ===Albums=== So far as of 2011, Hollerado has released 7 albums: *Demo in a Bag One (2007) *Demo in a Bag Two (2007) *Demo in a Bag Three (2007) *Demo in a Bag Four (2008) *Demo in a Bag Five (2009) *Record in a Bag (2010) *Margaritaville II: The Reckoning (2011) ===Singles=== *Americanarama (2010) *Juliette (2010) *Got To Lose (2011) *Good Day At The Races (2011) == Other websites == *Hollerado's Official website Category:Canadian rock bands Category:Indie rock bands
title: Hollerado
